vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
airPort.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],_values[i])) (patch_13.sol#9)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in airPort.transfer (patch_13.sol#5-12):
	-require(bool)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],_values[i])) patch_13.sol#9
